unnormalised: Payment gateways, the unsung heroes of online shopping! Without them, buying that saree for Diwali would be tougher than finding an affordable flat in Mumbai! Imagine explaining 'cash on delivery' for every single online order...yikes! My dadi would call it "backwards." We need more seamless options than deciding which biryani to order! Someone should build a gateway so easy, even Pappu from next door could use it!
